= qTracker 0.8.x series =

Software aimed at helping hikers & geocachers to determine their position, and record & monitoring tracks, routes and waypoints. 

Platform: Qt for Symbian S60
(note that the code can also be compiled and run on non-s60 platforms, but not all
functionality is available then, e.g. GPS/Sensors/Messaging).

* Works: *
 * Show position on map
 * Show wgs84 coordinates on map
 * Speed/Altitude/Heading display
 * Min/Max altitude, trip distance, trip time display.
 * Map autoselect
 * Map zoom
 * Installation works on C: and E: (F: is untested, but should work)
 * Calibrate map
 * Show/Hide/Record/Delete Tracks
 * Show/Hide/Edit/Save/Delete Waypoints
 * Show/Delete routes
 * Persistent settings (current map, zoom mode, many others)
 * Compass using magnetic north sensor
 * UTM datum support
 * Datum projection support for proj4 types: stereo, latlon, utm, tmerc
 * Compass options dialog
 * Clock options dialog

* Todo before 2nd alpha: *
 * Edit/Save Routes
 * Gpx import
 * Altitude options
 * Speed options
